jobCard.title: Process Videos
jobCard.description: Upload videos, choose an interpolation factor, and add them to the queue. All processing runs in your browser

upload.drag: or drag and drop video files
upload.formats: MP4, WEBM, MOV, and most major formats

queueCard.title: Processing Queue
queueCard.description: Your videos are processed one by one. The results will appear below
queueCard.limitationWarning: Some WebM and high-resolution (>1080p) videos may cause processing errors

ffmpegLoadFailed.title: Video Engine Load Failed
ffmpegLoadFailed.description: Could not load the video engine. Please try refreshing the page

invalidFileType.title: Invalid File Type
invalidFileType.description: File "{{fileName}}" was skipped because it's not a valid video file

noFilesSelected.title: No valid files selected
noFilesSelected.description: Please select one or more valid video files to process

errorReadingFile.title: Error Reading {{fileName}}
errorReadingFile.description: Could not read metadata from this video file. It has been marked as invalid

errors.sharedArrayBufferError: Browser configuration error (SharedArrayBuffer). Ensure HTTPS is used
